verses.name: Luke 1:44
verses.text: For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.

verses.name: Luke 1:45
verses.text: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.

verses.name: Luke 1:46
verses.text: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord,

verses.name: Luke 1:47
verses.text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.

verses.name: Luke 1:48
verses.text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden: for, behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.

verses.name: Luke 1:49
verses.text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy is his name.
